decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - The access doorway to the eastern elevation shall have a minimum clear width of 900mm, a level surface or ramp between the pavement and the floor and a door handle of not more than 1m above ground level.

Condition : 4 - The existing windows in the western elevation at first floor shall be obscure glazed, hinged to open inwards and shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise than with obscured glazing.

Condition : 5 - The proposed application brings a vacant building back into use in an area relatively well served by public transport for the use proposed. The proposal is not considered to have an adverse affect upon the on street parking or upon the amenities of adjoining residential occupiers. This is accordance with policies IMP.1.2 (The Reuse and Recycling of Urban Land and Buildings), ENV.B.1.1 (New Development), T.1.1 (Location of Development), T.1.2 (The Movement Implications of Development) of the adopted London Borough of Hounslow Unitary Development Plan 2003
description: Change of use from offices to community visioning centre including an addition of new staircase to rear of premises new internal lift and a mezzanine floor to second floor to form library to existing building.
